footerDescriptionFirst: This application is for informational and educational purposes only. No entity takes custody of anyone's money or cryptocurrency, extracts profits, hosts or manages markets. This user interface displays existing markets on the Tezos blockchain and allows for interaction with relevant smart contacts.
footerDescriptionSecond: From then on the market operates in a standard wayâ€“each token will pay out to one or zero coins,depending upon which way events transpire. A 5% fee on winnings rewards participants in the investment phase, and those who have contributed liquidity to the market during its operation.
title: About Tezos Prediction Markets
